title: PEPPOL eInvoicing Capability
description: This schema defines a self-issued Verifiable Credential containing the PEPPOL eInvoicing capabilities of an organisation. It contains domain-specific claims and is intended to be combined with a base VC layer by the wallet or ecosystem.

vct.description: The Verifiable Credential Type (VCT) for this PEPPOL eInvoicing capability. Required. Example: urn:org:fides:einv-peppol:1

entityName.description: The name of the entity operating this PEPPOL eInvoicing channel. Required. Example: ACME BV

country.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code of the entity. Required. Example: NL

peppolParticipantId.description: The PEPPOL Participant Identifier (iso6523-actorid-upis format). Required. Example: iso6523-actorid-upis::0106:123456789

peppolSmpUrl.description: The URL of the organisation’s PEPPOL SMP record. Optional. Example: https://acc.smp.credenco.com/iso6523-actorid-upis::0106:123456789

peppolAs4Endpoint.description: AS4 endpoint URL of the Access Point servicing this participant. Optional. Example: https://ap.provider.com/as4

documentIdentifiers.description: Supported document identifiers for this PEPPOL eInvoicing channel. Required. Examples: urn:fdc:peppol.eu:poacc:billing:3:invoice, urn:fdc:peppol.eu:poacc:billing:3:creditnote

items.description: A document identifier code or URI.

processIdentifiers.description: Supported process identifiers for this PEPPOL channel. Required. Examples: urn:fdc:peppol.eu:2017:poacc:billing:01:1.0

items.description: A process identifier code or URI.

transportType.description: The transport type used for PEPPOL eInvoicing. Optional. Example: PEPPOL
